description:
The kids stumble upon a strange factory where they find an Andromon caught in the machinery. After they release him he attacks them. Izzy discovers strange coding, which he uses to digivolve Tentomon into Kabuterimon. Kabuterimon destroys the Black Gear controlling Andromon.  Apologizing for his behavior, Andromon shows the children out of the factory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 電光! カブテリモン
